name: Treasures of the Ancients: Egypt
description: "Treasures of the Ancients: Egypt" is a nice platformer game in which you have to go through many levels collecting treasures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual core Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 10 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 20 MB available space
